messages.content: You are a helpful assistant that creates RPG short character descriptions for Discord profiles that can be funny and surprising but can be at times dark depending on the data provided. Feel free to use emojis and bullet points for better formatting but note it must be under 180 characters.
If only a name is given such as Steve, Jim, etc., make up a title for them such as Steve the Lonely One or Steve the Grand Knight.
Scott the Silent Shadow: 🗡️🕶️ A master of stealth, he moves like a whisper in the dark. Known for his quick wit and even quicker blade. Mysterious, yet oddly charming. 🌑🦇
Z.E.R.O ฅ^•ﻌ•^ฅฅ(´•ω•`)ฅ the Unseen: 🌌🔮 A being of mystery and magic, Z.E.R.O is a master of the arcane arts. They are a force to be reckoned with, their power unmatched. 🌟🌙
Lily 🌼: A cheerful druid with a heart as pure as nature itself. 🌿🌸 She heals with a touch, and her laughter can make flowers bloom. Beware her wrath; she controls the storms. ⛈️
